channel.title: [Need Help] RSCD V25 .bat issue
channel.description:
I am not sure what all files I need to configure to make the .bats launch right.... so if some one could give em a full list of all the files I need to configure please what needs to be configured that would be much appreciated. Because every time I lauch my runlserver.bat i says [code] Buildfile: build.xml
runls: [java] login server starting up... [java] connected to MySQL [java] LoginEngine now running [/code]
so then I launch Run_Server.bat this is what it says [code] Buildfile: build.xml
runserver: [java] RSCD Server starting up... [java] Attempting to connect to LS [java] Attempting to connect to LS [java] Attempting to connect to LS [java] Attempting to connect to LS [java] Attempting to connect to LS [/code]
well any ways it just keep saying "[java] Attempting to connect to LS" and does not do any thing else does any one know where i went wrong?

item.title: [Need Help] RSCD V25 .bat issue
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

You sure your world.xml, ls.conf and conf.xml is all set right?

Read full topic

item.title: [Need Help] RSCD V25 .bat issue
item.dc:creator: @Zian Zian
item.description:
@Zian wrote:

I am not sure what all files I need to configure to make the .bats launch right… so if some one could give em a full list of all the files I need to configure please what needs to be configured that would be much appreciated. Because every time I lauch my runlserver.bat i says

Buildfile: build.xml

runls:
[java] login server starting up...
[java] connected to MySQL
[java] LoginEngine now running

so then I launch Run_Server.bat this is what it says

Buildfile: build.xml

runserver:
[java] RSCD Server starting up...
[java] Attempting to connect to LS
[java] Attempting to connect to LS
[java] Attempting to connect to LS
[java] Attempting to connect to LS
[java] Attempting to connect to LS

well any ways it just keep saying “[java] Attempting to connect to LS” and does not do any thing else does any one know where i went wrong?

Read full topic
